languages.text: Пустотная станция Адептус Механикус встречает судно Вольного Торговца неприветливым взглядом оборонительных лазеров. Эксплоратор-лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два сдержанно интересуется, чем станция может быть полезна Вольному Торговцу.

traits.locale_text: Станция Адептус Механикус встречает вас неприветливым взглядом оборонительных лазеров. Эксплоратор-лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два сдержанно интересуется, чем станция может быть полезна Вольному Торговцу.

languages.text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Пустотная станция Адептус Механикус встречает судно Вольного Торговца неприветливым взглядом оборонительных лазеров. Эксплоратор-лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два сдержанно интересуется, чем станция может быть полезна Вольному Торговцу.

traits.locale_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus voidstation greets you with the surly stares of its defence lasers. An Explorator lexmechanic, Service Number Forty-Two, asks in a reserved tone how the station can be useful to the Rogue Trader.

The Adeptus Mechanicus voidstation greets you with the surly stares of its defence lasers. An Explorator lexmechanic, Service Number Forty-Two, asks in a reserved tone how the station can be useful to the Rogue Trader.

The Adeptus Mechanicus voidstation greets you with the unfriendly gaze of its defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic, Service Number Forty-Two, asks in a reserved tone how the station can be useful to the Rogue Trader.

When you approach the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, you are met with the hostile scrutiny of its defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

When you approach the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, you are met with the hostile scrutiny of its defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 当行商浪人的旗舰接近机械修会的星站时，星站的防御激光阵列充满敌意地检查着你的飞船。一位自称“42号服务单元”的开拓者思律机僧出现了，冷静地询问着这座星站该如何为行商浪人服务。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人的旗舰接近机械修会的星站时，星站的防御激光阵列充满敌意地检查着你的飞船。一位自称“42号服务单元”的开拓者思律机僧出现了，冷静地询问着这座星站该如何为行商浪人服务。

languages.text: Cuando la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se acerca a la estación del vacío del Adeptus Mechanicus, la recibe el escrutinio hostil de sus láseres de defensa. Un explorador lexmecánico que se presenta como Unidad de Servicio 42 pregunta en tono neutro en qué puede servir la estación a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Cuando te acercas a la estación del vacío del Adeptus Mechanicus, te recibe el escrutinio hostil de sus láseres de defensa. Un explorador lexmecánico que se presenta como Unidad de Servicio 42 pregunta en tono neutro en qué puede servir la estación a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの船が帝国技術局のヴォイドステーションに近づくと、防衛レーザーの敵意ある監視にさらされる。サービスユニット42と名乗る探索艦隊の法技術者が、ローグトレーダーにとってこのステーションがどう役立つかを冷静に尋ねてくる。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局（アデプトゥス・メカニカス）のヴォイドステーションに近づくと、防衛レーザーの敵意ある監視にさらされる。サービスユニット42と名乗る探索艦隊の法技術者が、ローグトレーダーにとってこのステーションがどう役立つかを冷静に尋ねてくる。

languages.text: Als sich das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} der Leerenstation des Adeptus Mechanicus nähert, wird es von den feindseligen Lasern der Station abgetastet. Ein Explorator Lexmechanicus, der sich als Diensteinheit 42 vorstellt, erkundigt sich leidenschaftslos, wie die Station {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} dienen kann.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Als sich das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} der Leerenstation des Adeptus Mechanicus nähert, wird es von den feindseligen Lasern der Station abgetastet. Ein Explorator Lexmechanicus, der sich als Diensteinheit 42 vorstellt, erkundigt sich leidenschaftslos, wie die Station {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} dienen kann.

Als du dich der Leerenstation des Adeptus Mechanicus näherst, wirst du von ihren Verteidigungslasern abgetastet. Ein Explorator Lexmechanicus, der sich als Diensteinheit 42 vorstellt, erkundigt sich leidenschaftslos, wie die Station {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} dienen kann.

languages.text: Lorsque le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} approche de la station spatiale de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, les lasers de défense de la station l'accueillent avec hostilité. Un Explorator lexmécanicien qui se présente comme l'unité de service 42 vous demande sur un ton monocorde comment la station pourrait se rendre utile .
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} approche de la station spatiale de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, les lasers de défense de la station l'accueillent avec hostilité. Un Explorator lexmécanicien qui se présente comme l'unité de service 42 vous demande sur un ton monocorde comment la station pourrait se rendre utile .

languages.text: Keşiftör uçsuz istasyonuna yaklaşan Hür Tacir'in gemisi, istasyonun savunma lazerlerinin düşmanca kilitlenmesiyle karşılanıyor. Kendisini Hizmet Birimi 42 olarak tanıtan bir Keşiftör Lexmekanik, duygusuz bir şekilde istasyonun Hür Tacir'e nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini soruyor.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the Adeptus Mechanicus void station, it is met with the hostile scrutiny of the station's defence lasers. An Explorator Lexmechanic who introduces himself as Service Unit 42 dispassionately enquires how the station can be of use to the Rogue Trader.
